import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DashboardEntreprise=()=>{const[offers,setOffers]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/dashboard/entreprise',{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setOffers(data.offers||[]));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-blue-700 mb-4",children:"Dashboard Entreprise"}),offers.map(offer=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-4 mb-3 bg-gray-100 rounded-lg shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"font-semibold",children:offer.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:offer.description})]},offer.id))]});};export default DashboardEntreprise;
